name: Grand Overture
flavor_text: It's not over until the vast red artificial intelligence sings.

frame.name: Wrath of the Colossus
frame.description: Heavy slug launcher that charges, then fires full auto while the trigger is held.

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description: Land hits with the slug launcher to load missiles,[Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to launch several missiles in a volley.
perks.name: Omega Strike

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Hand-Laid Stock
